/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The street, bathed in the warm glow of the sun, stretches out into the distance, flanked by lush green trees on both sides. The trees, standing tall and proud, add a sense of tranquility to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting long shadows on the ground. The perspective of the image is from the middle of the street, looking down its length, giving a sense of depth and distance. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of a sunny day in Beijing, capturing the essence of the city's natural beauty.
